Title: A Night Prayer in the Sanctuary

Verses.1:
*A Song of Ascents*
Oh, bless the Lord, all you servants of the Lord,
	you who serve throughout the nights in the house of the Lord!
Verses.2:
Lift your hands in that sanctuary,
	and bless the Lord.
Verses.3:
May the Lord bless you from Zion,
	He who made heaven and earth.

Changes: 2021-08-05 - Paul Prins: First translation of psalm 134 based on Greek, Latin, and some Hebrew - without liturgical formating, and including the preface.
